com.here.android.mpa.search

Class Media

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Media
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditorialMedia, ImageMedia, RatingMedia, ReviewMedia

    public abstract class Media
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the base class for additional rich content about a Place.

    The following specialized content types might be available:

    • Editorial content
    • Image content
    • Review content

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Media.Type
      Represents values describing supported Media types for a Place.
